form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: AFFIDAVIT OF DATE AND PLACE OF BIRTH

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/26/2023 AFFIDAVIT OF DATE AND PLACE OF BIRTH OF KHANDUBHAI JIVANJI DESAI 1, MANILAL AMBELAL DESAI, a retired Businessman, residing at plot No. 4, Chisekesi in Zambia, MAKE OATH AND SAY AS FOLLOWS: 1. My full names are MANILAL AMBELAL DESAI; and I reside at Plot No. 4, Chisekesi, Zambia. 2. My nationality is British. 3. I was born on the 3rd day of February, 1903 at KATARGAM in India. 4. I personally know KHANDUBHAI JIVANJI DESAI, son of JIVANJI FAKIRBHAI DESAI of Kathodra in India. 5. The said KHANDUBHAI JIVANJI DESAI, was born at SURAT in INDIA on the 2nd day of January, 1907. I can testify this as I was present, at the time of his birth, in the house where the said KHANDUBHAI JIVANJI DESAI was born. SWORN by the above named deponent ) MANILAL AMBELAL DESAI at CHISEKESI } im Zambia manital Ambelal Desai. this 2616 day of ahrl 1976 ) Before me COMMISSIONER FOR OATHS 1. R. PATEL COMM FOR OATHS 26 APR 1976 COMMISSIONER ATHS P.O. BOX 915, LUSAKA P.O. BOX USAKA
